transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir Vishal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye boliye.
Executive: Sir ji wo aap check kar lijiye maine whatsapp pe dala hai aapko ye ho gaya update.
Customer: Ek second ye to pehle se dala tha matlab 1996 current year to ye to 2027 kaise ho gaya tha.
Executive: [unintelligible]
Customer: Haan 2007 ab barabar hai 1996 ab sahi hai.
Executive: Sahi hai haan ji sir.
Customer: To ye fir ye 2027 kaise ho gaya tha.
Executive: Waise to.
Customer: Pata nahi aap jano abhi main thodi nahi janta wo to madam ne dekha luck by chance.
Executive: Wo to.
Customer: Wo to kuch kar rahi thi catalog mein to tab uska dhyan gaya udhar.
Executive: Kyunki sir aisa hota hai na ki aap jo sir hamare end se nahi aapke end se bhi ye cheez ho sakta hai.
Customer: Mere ko ek baat bataiye main website kaise edit kar sakta hu mere pass to koi option hi nahi hai uska.
Executive: Sir aapke pass option hai.
Customer: Option hai.
Executive: Aap usme hote ho change haan.
Customer: Par maine hum log ke end se.
Executive: Kisi ne nahi kiya hai wo to aaj kya hua.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Ki wo kya bolte hai ek customer ko hamare product ka catalog dena tha to IndiaMART ka catalog ka link bhej rahi thi madam to usme utne me usne about us click kiya to dekha sir isme aisa aisa aa raha hai to maine bola ruko phone laga ke bolta hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm aisa hai.
Executive: Isme sir dekho aisa hai na jaise aap profile wale section me jate hoge.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To waha pe primary details, additional details, website pages.
Executive: Ye sab option aate hai na templates design content to waha se to modification aap kar pate ho.
Customer: Valid bhi ho gaya.
Executive: Like usme agar aapko kuch photos add karne hai about us me dalna hai to sab chote mote minor changes aap waha se bhi kar pate ho.
Customer: Achcha nahi to ab ho gaya na.
Executive: Ab to ho gaya sir. Sir actually ek aur isme aapko update dena tha na.
Customer: Kya.
Executive: Matlab aapke pass koi sir youtube ya instagram handle hai kya aapke company ka.
Customer: Abhi wo sab uske kaam chalu hai mera aap log ka ek aur requirement hai ki aapka catalog dalo to visibility achchi ho jayegi to maine apna scan QR code bhi generate kar diya hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: QR code bhi generate kar diya hai catalog bhi ready ho gaya wo bhi upload karwata hu main.
Executive: Haan sir QR code.
Customer: QR code pe aap scan karoge to mera catalog open ho jayega aisa.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Wo wo kaha jayega sir.
Executive: Wo aapke IndiaMART pe dal dunga mere ispe.
Executive: Product me daloge.
Customer: Haan product me ya to fir about us me dal dunga QR code agar aur jankari chahiye ya catalog dekhna hai aap wo QR code pe access karo aapko mil jayega sara details aapke mobile pe.
Executive: Chaliye to wo sir better hai isme aap jo images quality abhi bata rahe ho jo current status hai na sir.
Customer: Quality bhi usme dala hai maine achchi achchi aapko main bhejta hu catalog ek bar.
Executive: Chahiye to aap upload kar do isko.
Customer: Aap wo main ek din kara deta hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isme sir leads aana shuru ho jayegi.
Customer: Youtube videos ke liye sir kya hai na fir professional bulana padega shoot karwani padegi proper.
Executive: Sir usme aap kon se bhi sir dalte hoge na shorts ya reels wagera man lijiye hum koi product bana rahe hai demo chal raha ho.
Customer: Na na aisa kuch nahi karte sir hum log.
Executive: Ye sab aap facebook pe aap karte ho to near by wale sare bhi to waha pe aate honge jo hamare friend circle me hote hai.
Executive: Aaj visible rehta hai.
Customer: Chalo theek hai try karta hu banwata hu reels abhi hai do do madam hai in dono ko lagata hu kaam pe.
Executive: Reel banane ke liye.
Executive: Wo sir wo log bylets consume karti hai ya matlab profile update karti hai.
Customer: Haan nahi unko ek mobile hi de diya na extra.
Customer: IndiaMART wahi log chalati hai ab sab.
Executive: Unka number yaha pe center kara de sir taki calls wagera.
Customer: Ye jis se aap call kar rahe ho yahi number hai.
Executive: 021.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aap call call mere pass aayegi par whatsapp call wo log use karte hai aisa hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan ab un log ko itna idea nahi hai na.
Customer: To whatsapp web chalati hai wo dono madam.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan is number se whatsapp hai unpe.
Customer: Haan isi number ka whatsapp madam log chalati hai.
Executive: Sir isliye aap logo ko dikha hoga last time aap bata rahe the kuch bylets aapne check kara hai because last time aap bylets ke liye.
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch improvement nahi hua hai sab wahi thaki hui bylets aa rahi hai meri relevant kuch nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: PVC conveyor ki jo consume karne jata hu wo gayab hi ho jati hai.
Executive: Wahi issue aa raha hai.
Executive: To bylets calls bhi to aa rahe honge sir aapke pass.
Customer: Nahi aa rahe na ek bhi call nahi aaya abhi tak aap dekh sakte hai.
Executive: To uska bhi thoda ek second dijiyega.
Customer: Call bhi nahi hai ek bar aayi thi khali ek IndiaMART wire se aaya tha bas.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan ji sir pichle mahine me teen call thi is mahine me zero call.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Pichle mahine me teen call is mahine me zero call hai.
Executive: Fir.
Executive: Sir ek bar kabhi hum video me join honge to main aapko ek naya insight.
Executive: Wo dikha dunga taki hame idea ho jayega ki isme reason kya aa raha hai.
Customer: Main abhi monday tak free nahi hu sir.
Executive: Monday ya Tuesday jab whatsapp pe aap message ping kar dena hum wapas kar denge.
Customer: Chalega chalega.
Executive: Aapko madam ko bol dunga ki aapko appointment dal de ki aap is din call kar dijiye theek hai.
Customer: Sure sure sir okay.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Website showing incorrect year (2027 instead 1996).

- No improvement in buylead quality.

- Not receiving any calls.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer can edit profile.

- Executive asked about YouTube/Instagram handle.

- Executive suggested sharing QR code for catalog.

- Executive offered a video call to discuss insights.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will ping on WhatsApp to schedule call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, catalog, qr code, buyleads, website
